channel.title: Content Update 2 Bugs
channel.description:
Well, so far I only found one relevant bug: if you start running with only the Satchel trigger (if you dropped all Satchels) a new Satchel shows up during the animation and stays after it ends. Other than that, I only found a clipping issue in Anomalous Materials if you kill the sitting guard (the one who placed a bet on Gordon's arrival) he'll clip through the console.
Oh and save files are pretty much F'd up: AI no longer works and triggers are visible. Just the usual thing with updates.

item.title: Content Update 2 Bugs
item.dc:creator: Garfuncle
item.description:
Singleplayer bugs I’ve found.

HECU Marine’s hands clip into the MP5 using old Combine SMG animations.

Security Guard’s right-side hip radio clips noticeably into his hands and chest during animations of all kinds.

New crossbow lies almost directly upright when found on the ground.

Reversely, new shotgun clips into tables when found on the ground.

Rocket Launcher world model is super shiny.
